analysis.description:
WallCryptoStreet.companiesAreInitiated (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#45-48) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateCompanies (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#311-319)

WallCryptoStreet.purchaseAd has external calls inside a loop:
	- shareholdersAddresses[i].transfer(commissionOneShareholder) (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#112-113)

WallCryptoStreet.ceoAddress should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#16-17)
WallCryptoStreet.cfoAddress should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#17-19)
WallCryptoStreet.companiesAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#45-48)
WallCryptoStreet.pauseGame (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#51-54) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.unPauseGame (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#54-56) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.GetIsPauded (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#57-61) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.purchaseCompany (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#65-87) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.purchaseAd (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#91-122) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.purchaseShare (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#125-155) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.updateCompanyPrice (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#174-182) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.updateSharePrice (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#187-195) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.getCompany (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#198-222) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.getShare (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#224-234) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.getMyShares (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#236-249) should be declared external
WallCryptoStreet.InitiateCompanies (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#311-319) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xcf3a6ec03b0e8e8525933d4e2439d4d5ee2763ce.sol#1): it allows old versions
